Outrigger Fiji Beach Resort Outrigger Fiji Beach Resort has been designed and built to reflect a traditional Fijian village. Whilst staying at Outrigger Fiji Beach Resort enjoy a Spa experience like no other at the magnificent Bebe Day Spa located on the hill top with breathtaking ocean vistas. Resort View King Room (5 Nights) Travel Dates: 1 Apr - 15 Apr 26, 16 Jul - 14 Sep 26 & 12 Oct - 31 Oct 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $767 Travel Dates: 16 Apr - 23 Jun 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $712 Travel Dates: 1 Nov - 22 Dec 26 & 24 Jan - 31 Mar 27 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $607 Travel Dates: 1 Dec - 19 Dec 25 & 25 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $592 Travel Dates: 11 Nov - 30 Nov 25 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $687 Ocean View King Room (5 Nights) Travel Dates: 1 Nov - 22 Dec 26 & 24 Jan - 31 Mar 27 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $642 Travel Dates: 16 Apr - 23 Jun 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $762 Travel Dates: 1 Apr - 15 Apr 26, 16 Jul - 14 Sep 26 & 12 Oct - 31 Oct 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $832 Travel Dates: 1 Dec - 19 Dec 25 & 25 Jan - 31 Mar 26 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $647 Travel Dates: 11 Nov - 30 Nov 25 Family per person 2 adults and 2 children (aged 2-11 years) fr $742 Note: ^Discount is already included in the advertised price and no further discount applies. #Meimei Nanny Child Minding Ratio: - 6 months to 2 years = 1 Meimei staff per child - 3 years to 12 years = 1 Meimei staff per 2 children - Maximum 2 children per Meimei (Nanny) Includes 5 nights at Outrigger Fiji Beach Resort - FREE Wi-Fi, use of non-motorised water sports, introductory yoga & meditation, gym access and tennis. - Up to 2 children under 12 years PLAY and EAT FREE from the children's menu or buffet only (conditions apply). For Oceanview Rooms and above receive the Talai Butler Service from 7am-11pm daily including: - Complimentary welcome drinks & cold towel on arrival - Champagne and canapes delivered to your room every afternoon Bonus Save up to 25% on accommodation^ PLUS a choice of either: FJ$200 Bebe Spa Treatment credit per stay per room OR Meimei Nanny for 2 days# PLUS for travel 01 Feb-26 Mar 26 also choose from: 2 Limitless Adventure Passes per room with 11 activities to choose from Per Person, from $592 Enquire More Deals Enquire *Terms and Conditions It is our policy to present the cost of our holidays inclusive of all airport and government charges. Please accept however that these charges are not within our control, therefore we reserve the right to pass on any increase . Travel agent professional service fees where charged, will be additional to the advertised prices . Closeout and blackout periods apply over school holidays and peak holiday periods & availability of seats & rooms is likely to be very limited over this time . Valid for sales to 30 Nov 2025. Valid for travel commenced and completed within the period 1 Nov 2025 to 31 Mar 2027 (unless otherwise specified).Family pricing is based on a per person cost for up to 2 adults and 3 children (2-11) sharing one room and using existing bedding. Extra night rates are per person. Prices shown are based on per person costs in New Zealand Dollars, for payment by cash, cheque or eftpos only. Credit card sales not permitted unless Travel Agent acts as a merchant. Capacity limitations apply and may not be available on all services. Travel requiring an overnight stay in New Zealand will be at passengers own expense. Events beyond our control such as currency fluctuations and changes to the price of aviation fuel may result in prices variations . Strict cancellation fees apply. Packages are based on consecutive nights. For split stays please contact your travel consultant. For full terms and conditions and cancellation fees please contact your local travel agent for more information. Trade enquiries via GO Holidays. ISSUE Date 30 Oct 25.
